org.jbones.schedule

Class StreamUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbones.schedule.StreamUtils

  • public class StreamUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    transfers bytes from an InputStream to an OutputStream; like a pipe or a patch cable. Util functions for dealing with byte streams; where you want to serve bytes. Read bytes from something (like a file), and send to something else (like a HttpServletResponse ect). Used in a lot of places - DataStreamStoreServer, ContentMgmtSys, etc.

      static void transfer(java.io.InputStream in, java.io.OutputStream out)
      transfers ALL bytes from in to out.
      static void transfer(java.io.InputStream in, java.io.OutputStream out, long bytes)
      does a buffered transfer of 'bytes' number of bytes in the inputstream to the outputstream.
      static void transferUntilNegativeOne(java.io.InputStream in, java.io.OutputStream out)
      very slow byte by byte transfer until -1 is reached.
